metadata.description: A network of waterways shrouded in perpetual fog, where steam-powered vessels ply the misty routes. Along the canalbanks, players may encounter enigmatic riverboat captains and their passengers.
metadata.atmosphere: Steampunk eeriness: wisps of fog cling to brick arches as paddlewheels churn the dark waters, while lanterns cast flickering shadows on the mist-shrouded banks.
metadata.significance: A location for clandestine meetings or smuggling operations.
